content.rendered:
Our Vision

To be recognised by our clients for our experience, market leadership, quality of delivery and to be the preferred company for talented professionals.

Our Mission

To provide an unrivalled level of service to our clients across the globe and to be the consultancy that delivers innovative, fit for purpose and value-added services.

Our Values

  • We never compromise on quality and integrity
  • We are transparent and open in our business ethics
  • We care about the safety of our people, the environment and client assets
  • We are committed to teamwork and innovation
  • We make a difference by offering proactive and pragmatic solutions

jetpack-related-posts.title: Conflict Checking Public Statement
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: Circumstances may arise whereby the interests of a client conflict with the interests of another client. At AqualisBraemar LOC, our overriding value is Quaerite vera – to seek the truth – and this is at the heart of all services that we offer our clients and how we conduct our…

jetpack-related-posts.title: DP FMEA & Audit - Dynamic Positioning
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: We provide an experienced multidisciplinary team of engineering and operational resources to support the DP industry. Aqualis delivers dynamic positioning services including DP FMEA, DP audit, DP Assurance and DP project management.

jetpack-related-posts.title: Offshore Energy MWS
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: We specialise in providing marine warranty services (MWS) for nearshore and offshore upstream construction projects, rig move, project cargo, renewable energy projects, decommissioning and removal projects and other services including dynamic positioning, industry standard and general surveys to the marine and offshore industries. With our team consisting of highly qualified…

jetpack-related-posts.title: Our Organisations
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: AqualisBraemar AqualisBraemar is a company that, through its subsidiaries and associates, offers adjusting, marine, offshore and renewables consultancy services to the energy, shipping and insurance industries. The group employs specialist engineers, naval architects, master mariners, loss adjusters and technical consultants in 48 offices located across 33 countries. Offshore Wind Consultants…

jetpack-related-posts.title: Salvage & Wreck Removal
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: At AqualisBraemar our consultants understand the importance of crisis management and the need for risk and cost mitigation. Prioritising the interests of our clients, combined with effective operational planning, integrated crisis and emergency response organisation is our single priority. Our established relationships with prominent contractors in the field enable us…

jetpack-related-posts.title: David Brand | Finance Director (Insurance Services)
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: A qualified Chartered Accountant and Economics Graduate, David has a career history spanning 25 years in the marine industry, working for both owners and service providers covering technical services, procurement, consultancy and insurance. Prior to joining the Group in February 2017 as Finance Director for Braemar Technical Services, David has…
